author: cms-sw
body: `git cms-init` is always creating `$CMSSW_BASE/src`. This means if one has deleted the CMSSW_BASE after setting the env and run `git cms-init` then it will create `$CMSSW_BASE/src` again. This PR proposes to create `$CMSSW_BASE/src` if not exists and only create `src` if `$CMSSW_BASE` already exists.
title: Do not force create CMSSW_BASE/src
